title: paripurNa suthanthira
sahitya:
paripUrNa sutantira varam vENDum annaiyE



anupallavi



virivAna viNNilE viLangum aghAyam pOlE piriyAda svarUpattil arivAgi ninridap



caraNam 1



oru noDi inbamum OyAda tunbamum perugum iru vinaiyin bhEdamai

illAda



caraNam 2



kaTTaDimait-tuyarai veTTi erindu manap-paTrait-turandu sukhamuTra

jnAna dhIranAm  



caraNam 3



mOhAntakArattil mUzhgi azhiyAmal Ekanta mOnattil irundapaDi

irukkap  



caraNam 4



shuddha saccidAnandat-tUriya vaLa nATTil siddharuDanE shivan

muktanAi vAzndiDum
